name: baixiaoying-mcp-server
description: Baichuan Medical AI MCP Server - provides medical Q&A, document upload, and evidence-based answers powered by Baichuan-M3-Plus model
long_description:
Baixiaoying MCP Server integrates Baichuan AI's medical large language models (Baichuan-M3-Plus / M2-Plus) into any MCP-compatible client.

Capabilities:
- Medical Q&A with evidence-based responses and source citations
- Medical document upload and document-based Q&A
- File management (upload, list, status check, delete)
- MCP Apps visual UI support for rich chat results

Compatible with Claude Desktop, Cursor, and all MCP protocol clients.
